comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of the demonstration of the Lundin Lifeboat:[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5126123866/in/photostream/]
Improved version of the Lundin Lifeboat; photo from Bain's 1914 photostream (this is the one that attempted the Atlantic crossing):
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5765103332/in/photostream/]
